summary: This document outlines the corporate resolutions of HBRK Associates Inc, authorizing the designation of Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas as a depositary, custodian, or investment advisor. It details the powers granted to authorized signers for managing accounts and the responsibilities of the corporation regarding these accounts.

persons.name: Richard D. Kahn
persons.context: Richard D. Kahn is identified as an authorized signer for HBRK Associates Inc, responsible for executing the corporate resolutions related to the management of accounts with Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: The document is a Certificate of Corporate Resolutions for HBRK Associates Inc.
Richard D. Kahn is named as an authorized signer for the corporation.
The corporation authorizes Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage its accounts.
The document outlines the powers and responsibilities of the authorized signers.
No other individuals are mentioned as authorized signers in this document.
